Scripts.OnLoad: local cb_init_fn = function() local info for i=1,4 do info = {} info.func = function() FindGroup_ClicktoCBFind(i); ToggleDropDownMenu(nil, nil, FindGroupOptionsFindFrameComboBox1); end info.text = FindGroup_GetFindS(i) if FindGroup_GetCBFindI(i) == true then info.checked = true end UIDropDownMenu_AddButton(info); end end UIDropDownMenu_Initialize(this, cb_init_fn)

local cb_init_fn = function() local info for i=1, FindGroup_Patches_Max() do info = {} info.func = function() FindGroup_Patches_Click(i); ToggleDropDownMenu(nil, nil, FindGroupOptionsFindFrameComboBox2); end info.text = FindGroup_Patches_Text(i) if FindGroup_Patches_Checked(i) == true then info.checked = true end UIDropDownMenu_AddButton(info); end end UIDropDownMenu_Initialize(this, cb_init_fn)

local cb_init_fn = function() local info for i=1, #FGL.db.defbackgroundfiles do info = {} info.func = function() FindGroup_ClicktoCBBack(i); UIDropDownMenu_SetSelectedID(FindGroupOptionsInterfaceFrameComboBox1, this:GetID(), 0) end info.text = FindGroup_GetBackS(i) info.keepShownOnClick = 1 if i == FindGroup_GetCBBackI() then info.checked = true end UIDropDownMenu_AddButton(info); end end UIDropDownMenu_Initialize(this, cb_init_fn)

local cb_init_fn = function() local info for i=1, FindGroup_APatches_Max() do info = {} info.func = function() FindGroup_APatches_Click(i); ToggleDropDownMenu(nil, nil, FindGroupOptionsAlarmFrameComboBox4); end info.text = FindGroup_APatches_Text(i) if FindGroup_APatches_Checked(i) == true then info.checked = true end UIDropDownMenu_AddButton(info); end end UIDropDownMenu_Initialize(this, cb_init_fn)

local cb_init_fn = function() local info for i=1,27 do info = {} info.func = function() FindGroup_ClicktoCBSound(i); UIDropDownMenu_SetSelectedID(FindGroupOptionsAlarmFrameComboBox2, this:GetID(), 0); ToggleDropDownMenu(nil, nil, FindGroupOptionsAlarmFrameComboBox2); end info.text = FindGroup_GetSoundS(i) if i == FindGroup_GetCBSoundI() then info.checked = true info.func = function() FindGroup_ClicktoCBSound(i); FindGroup_ClickPlaySound(); UIDropDownMenu_SetSelectedID(FindGroupOptionsAlarmFrameComboBox2, this:GetID(), 0); end info.tooltipText = "Воспроизведение" info.tooltipTitle = "Клик:" info.tooltipOnButton = 1 info.keepShownOnClick = 1 info.noClickSound = 1 end UIDropDownMenu_AddButton(info); end end UIDropDownMenu_Initialize(this, cb_init_fn)

local cb_init_fn = function() local info for i=1, FindGroup_CPatches_Max() do info = {} info.func = function() if FGL.db.createpatches[i] == true then local f=0 for h=1, #FGL.db.createpatches do if FGL.db.createpatches[h] == true then f=f+1 end end if f>1 then FindGroup_CPatches_Click(i); ToggleDropDownMenu(nil, nil, FindGroupOptionsCreateViewFrameComboBox2); end
else FindGroup_CPatches_Click(i); ToggleDropDownMenu(nil, nil, FindGroupOptionsCreateViewFrameComboBox2); end end info.text = FindGroup_CPatches_Text(i) if FindGroup_CPatches_Checked(i) == true then info.checked = true end UIDropDownMenu_AddButton(info); end end UIDropDownMenu_Initialize(this, cb_init_fn)
this:RegisterForDrag("LeftButton") FindGroupOptionsFrame:SetScript("OnUpdate", function(self, elapsed) FindGroup_UpdateOptions() end) chan_check_points(this) this:SetBackdropColor(0, 0, 0, 1)
